meanings.sent1: The editors at the newspaper review articles for mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The editors made sure the book was error-free before publishing.
meanings.sent3: The editors had a tough time deciding which photos to include in the magazine.
meanings.sent4: The editors of the journal carefully curated the content for the upcoming issue.
meanings.sent5: The editors meticulously checked every detail of the manuscript.

meanings.definition: A software program used for editing text or images.
meanings.sent1: I use different editors to enhance my photos before posting them online.
meanings.sent2: The new editors have advanced features that make editing easier.
meanings.sent3: The editors on my computer crashed right when I was about to save my work.
meanings.sent4: The editors in the graphic design software allow for precise adjustments.
meanings.sent5: The editors helped me correct spelling errors in my document.
